mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE_DETAIL WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} AND EMP_CODE = #{empCode}

WITH DETAIL_INFO AS ( ( SELECT EMP_CODE, USER_ID, SEQ FROM EMPLOYEE_DETAIL WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #companyCode# ) ),
MAX_SEQ AS ( SELECT EMP_CODE, MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM DETAIL_INFO GROUP BY EMP_CODE ),
ALL_USER_ID AS ( SELECT EMP_CODE, USER_ID FROM DETAIL_INFO WHERE ( EMP_CODE, SEQ ) IN ( SELECT EMP_CODE, SEQ FROM MAX_SEQ ) )
SELECT EMP_CODE, USER_ID FROM ALL_USER_ID WHERE USER_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY EMP_CODE
mapper.insert: Insert into EMPLOYEE_DETAIL (COMPANY_CODE , EMP_CODE , SEQ , UPDATE_HISTORY , UPDATE_DATE , WORKPLACE_CODE , DEPT_CODE , POSITION_CODE , USER_ID , PHONE_NUMBER , EMAIL , ZIP_CODE , BASIC_ADDRESS , DETAIL_ADDRESS , LEVEL_OF_EDUCATION,IMAGE) values ( #{companyCode} , #{empCode} , #{seq} , #{updateHistory} , #{updateDate} , #{workplaceCode} , #{deptCode} , #{positionCode} , #{userId} , #{phoneNumber} , #{email} , #{zipCode} , #{basicAddress} , #{detailAddress} , #{levelOfEducation} , #{image} )
